verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What does it mean to be saved?
Isn't it more than just a prayer to pray,
More than just a way to Hea-ven?

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
What does it mean to be His?
To be formed in His Likeness,
Know that we have a purpose:
To be salt and light in the world, in the world,
To be salt and light in the world!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let the redeemed of the Lord say so,
Let the redeemed of the Lord say so,
Let the redeemed of the Lord say so, say so, say so! (2X)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh that the church would arise Oh that we would see with Jesus' eyes
We could show the world heaven

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
Show what it means to be His: To be formed in His Likeness
Show them they have a purpose:
To be salt and light in the world, in the world, to be salt and light in the world!
To be salt and light in the world, in the world, to be salt and light in the world!

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I am redeemed, I am redeemed, I am redeemed, I am redeemed
I am redeemed, I am redeemed (2X)
